description:
Julius negotiates with an unexpected ally while Scarlet hones her fists for a new kind of feast.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Buatsui Oniku no Shin made Body Blow de Hi o Tooshite mo Yoroshii Deshouka
May I Cook This Thick Cut of Pork Through with Body Punches?
¿Puedo asar a golpes hasta la médula esta carne tan gruesa?
分厚いお肉の芯までボディブローで火を通してもよろしいでしょうか
